---
title: "settings.json"
---

## High-level description
This file contains Visual Studio Code (VS Code) workspace settings for a project. It configures various aspects of the editor environment, including environment variable handling, UI customization, TypeScript configuration, GitHub pull request settings, and Java build configuration.

## Symbols

### `settings.json`
#### Description
This JSON object defines specific settings for the VS Code workspace. Each key-value pair represents a different configuration option.

#### Internal Logic
The file sets the following configurations:

1. Disables automatic cloaking of environment variables
2. Customizes the status bar color
3. Specifies the TypeScript SDK path
4. Configures GitHub pull request settings
5. Sets Java build configuration update behavior

Let's break down each setting:

1. `"dotenv.enableAutocloaking": false`
   - Disables automatic cloaking (hiding) of environment variables in the editor

2. `"workbench.colorCustomizations": { "statusBar.background": "#007acc" }`
   - Customizes the VS Code UI by setting the status bar background color to a specific blue shade (#007acc)

3. `"typescript.tsdk": "node_modules/typescript/lib"`
   - Specifies the path to the TypeScript SDK, pointing to the local installation in the project's node_modules directory

4. `"githubPullRequests.ignoredPullRequestBranches": ["develop"]`
   - Configures the GitHub Pull Requests extension to ignore pull requests targeting the "develop" branch

5. `"java.configuration.updateBuildConfiguration": "automatic"`
   - Sets the Java build configuration to update automatically when changes are detected

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Value | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:------|:------------|
| dotenv.enableAutocloaking | boolean | false | Disables automatic hiding of environment variables |
| workbench.colorCustomizations.statusBar.background | string | "#007acc" | Sets the status bar background color |
| typescript.tsdk | string | "node_modules/typescript/lib" | Specifies the TypeScript SDK path |
| githubPullRequests.ignoredPullRequestBranches | array | ["develop"] | Specifies branches to ignore for GitHub pull requests |
| java.configuration.updateBuildConfiguration | string | "automatic" | Sets Java build configuration update behavior |

## Dependencies
This configuration file implies the use of several VS Code extensions and project dependencies:

| Dependency | Purpose |
|:-----------|:--------|
| dotenv extension | Handling of environment variables |
| TypeScript | JavaScript superset for type-checking |
| GitHub Pull Requests extension | Integration with GitHub pull requests |
| Java extension pack | Java development support |

Note: These dependencies are not directly declared in the file but are inferred from the settings used.
